name: FilingFormType
title: Filing Form Type
description: Filing Form Type codes for insurance operations.

concept.display: BMC34 - Cargo (Hauling of Household goods only)
concept.definition: Federal Motor Carrier Safety Administration form required for motor carriers transporting household goods, providing evidence of cargo liability coverage.

designation.value: BMC34 - Carga (transporte de artículos domésticos solamente)

concept.definition: Federal Motor Carrier Safety Administration form series providing proof of motor vehicle liability coverage for commercial carriers.
Standard commercial auto liability certificate form used to provide proof of coverage.

designation.value: Formulario E - Responsabilidad civil de automóviles

concept.definition: Standard cargo liability certificate form used to provide proof of coverage for transported goods.

designation.value: Formulario H - Responsabilidad civil de carga

concept.display: MCS90 - Endorsement attached to Liability/Cargo Liability policies
concept.definition: Federal endorsement form providing public liability coverage for motor carriers of property, required by the U.S. Department of Transportation.

designation.value: MCS90 - Avenant annexé aux polices d'assurance en responsabilité civile ou de marchandises/cargaisons
MCS90 - Endoso adjunto a pólizas de responsabilidad civil/responsabilidad de carga

concept.definition: State-specific endorsement form required for commercial vehicles operating in Ohio.

designation.value: OS-32 - Avenant spécifique à l'état d'Ohio

concept.definition: Canadian National Safety Code policy form required for interprovincial or international motor carrier operations.
Federal form used to notify authorities of cancellation or termination of motor carrier liability coverage.
